project.name: Multi-Tenant SaaS Platform with Project and Task Management
project.description: A production-ready multi-tenant SaaS application with role-based access control, tenant isolation, projects, tasks, audit logs, and full Dockerized deployment.

notes.authentication: All users authenticate via JWT-based login at /api/auth/login.
notes.environment: This submission uses development/test credentials only. No production secrets included.
notes.docker: Application is fully containerized and runs using docker-compose up -d.
